forest.description: You are in a calm forest. The leaves rustle in the wind. Paths lead north and east.

cave.description: A dark cave with dripping water. You can hear distant growling.

river.description: A river flows swiftly. You see fish and maybe danger lurking.

bridge.description: A creaky wooden bridge over a chasm. It leads to a locked gate.

locked_room.description: You've entered a hidden chamber with glowing walls. A golden chest sits in the center.
